trans-unit.source: Specifies values representing possible states for an accessible object.
trans-unit.target: 指定表示辅助性对象的可能状态的值。

trans-unit.source: An accessible object can be associated with one or more of these states.
trans-unit.target: 辅助性对象可以是与一个或多个这些状态关联。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the accessibility application, see "Microsoft Active Accessibility" in the Microsoft Developer Network (MSDN) library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.
trans-unit.target: 有关辅助功能应用程序的详细信息，请参阅"Microsoft Active Accessibility"在 Microsoft Developer Network (MSDN) 库中http://msdn.microsoft.com/library。

trans-unit.source: The following code example demonstrates the creation of an accessibility-aware chart control, using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject> classes to expose accessible information.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何创建一个具有辅助功能的图表控件，并使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.ControlAccessibleObject>类来公开可访问的信息。

trans-unit.source: The control plots two curves along with a legend.
trans-unit.target: 该控件绘制图例以及两条曲线。

trans-unit.source: The `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class, which derives from `ControlAccessibleObject`, is used in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A> method to provide custom accessible information for the chart control.
trans-unit.target: `ChartControlAccessibleObject`类，该类派生自`ControlAccessibleObject`，在使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A>方法以提供为图表控件的自定义可访问的信息。

trans-unit.source: Because the chart legend is not an actual control based on <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>, but instead is drawn by the chart control, it does not contain any built-in accessible information.
trans-unit.target: 因为图表图例不是基于的实际控件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control>，但改为绘制图表控件中，通过它不包含任何内置的辅助性信息。

trans-unit.source: Because of this, the `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class overrides the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.GetChild%2A> method to return the `CurveLegendAccessibleObject` that represents accessible information for each part of the legend.
trans-unit.target: 因此，`ChartControlAccessibleObject`类重写<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.GetChild%2A>方法以返回`CurveLegendAccessibleObject`，表示将图例的每个部分的访问信息。

trans-unit.source: When an accessible-aware application uses this control, the control can provide the necessary accessible information.
trans-unit.target: 当辅助功能的应用程序使用此控件时，该控件可以提供所需的可访问信息。

trans-unit.source: This code excerpt demonstrates using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates> enumeration with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.State%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 此代码片段演示如何使用<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates>枚举<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.State%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: See the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> class overview for the complete code example.
trans-unit.target: 请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject>完整的代码示例的类概述。

trans-unit.source: The important information that should be conveyed to the user immediately.
trans-unit.target: 应该立即传达给用户的重要信息。

trans-unit.source: For example, a battery-level indicator reaching a critical low level would transition to this state, in which case, a blind access utility would announce this information immediately to the user, and a screen magnification program would scroll the screen so that the battery indicator is in view.
trans-unit.target: 例如，降低到临界低电平的电池电量指示器将转换为此状态，这种情况下，盲访问实用工具会立即将该信息通知给用户，并且屏幕放大程序会滚动屏幕，以便能够看到电池指示器。

trans-unit.source: This state is also appropriate for any prompt or operation that must be completed before the user can continue.
trans-unit.target: 此状态也适用于任何提示或用户在能够继续操作之前必须要先完成的操作。

trans-unit.source: The low-priority information that might not be important to the user.
trans-unit.target: 对于用户或许不重要的低优先级信息。

trans-unit.source: The important information that does not need to be conveyed to the user immediately.
trans-unit.target: 不需要立即传达给用户的重要信息。

trans-unit.source: For example, when a battery-level indicator is starting to reach a low level, it could generate a medium-level alert.
trans-unit.target: 例如，当电池电量指示器即将达到低电平时，它会生成中级警报。

trans-unit.source: Blind access utilities could then generate a sound to let the user know that important information is available, without actually interrupting the user's work.
trans-unit.target: 然后，盲访问实用工具会发出声音，使用户知道有重要信息，而实际并不中断用户的工作。

trans-unit.source: Users can then query the alert information any time they choose.
trans-unit.target: 用户可以在任何选定时间查询警报信息。

trans-unit.source: The object that rapidly or constantly changes appearance.
trans-unit.target: 迅速或经常更改外观的对象。

trans-unit.source: Graphics that are occasionally animated, but not always, should be defined as <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleRole.Graphic" /><see langword="OR" /><see langword="Animated" />.
trans-unit.target: 偶尔会动（并非一直在动）的图形应该定义为 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleRole.Graphic" /><see langword="OR" /><see langword="Animated" />。

trans-unit.source: This state should not be used to indicate that the object's location is changing.
trans-unit.target: 此状态不应用来指示对象的位置正在更改。

trans-unit.source: A control that cannot accept input in its current condition.
trans-unit.target: 不能在其当前条件下接受输入的控件。

trans-unit.source: An object with a selected check box.
trans-unit.target: 具有选中的复选框的对象。

trans-unit.source: The hidden children of the object that are items in an outline or tree structure.
trans-unit.target: 对象的隐藏子级，这些子级是大纲或树结构中的项。

trans-unit.source: The default button or menu item.
trans-unit.target: 默认按钮或菜单项。

trans-unit.source: The displayed children of the object that are items in an outline or tree structure.
trans-unit.target: 对象的显示子级，这些子级是大纲或树结构中的项。

trans-unit.source: The altered selection such that all objects between the selection anchor, which is the object with the keyboard focus, and this object take on the anchor object's selection state.
trans-unit.target: 改动的选择，其中，选择定位点之间的所有对象（带有键盘焦点的对象）以及此对象都采用定位点对象的选择状态。

trans-unit.source: If the anchor object is not selected, the objects are removed from the selection.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有选择定位点对象，对象就会从所选内容中移除。

trans-unit.source: If the anchor object is selected, the selection is extended to include this object and all objects in between.
trans-unit.target: 如果选择了定位点对象，所选内容就会扩展至包括此对象以及定位点之间的所有对象。

trans-unit.source: You can set the selection state by combining this with <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleSelection.AddSelection" /> or <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleSelection.RemoveSelection" />.
trans-unit.target: 您可以通过将它与 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleSelection.AddSelection" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleSelection.RemoveSelection" /> 结合使用来设置所选内容状态。

trans-unit.source: This state does not change the focus or the selection anchor unless it is combined with <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleSelection.TakeFocus" />.
trans-unit.target: 此状态不会更改焦点或选择定位点，除非将它与 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleSelection.TakeFocus" /> 结合使用。

trans-unit.source: The object that is not fixed to the boundary of its parent object and that does not move automatically along with the parent.
trans-unit.target: 没有固定到其父对象的边界的对象和不会随父对象一起自动移动的对象。

trans-unit.source: The object on the active window that can receive keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: 可接收键盘焦点的活动窗口上的对象。

trans-unit.source: An object with the keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: 具有键盘焦点的对象。

trans-unit.source: The object displays a pop-up menu or window when invoked.
trans-unit.target: 该对象在调用会显示弹出菜单或窗口。

trans-unit.source: The object hot-tracked by the mouse, meaning its appearance is highlighted to indicate the mouse pointer is located over it.
trans-unit.target: 由鼠标热跟踪的对象，意味着其外观突出显示以表示鼠标指针停留在其上。

trans-unit.source: A three-state check box or toolbar button whose state is indeterminate.
trans-unit.target: 状态不确定的三态复选框或工具栏按钮。

trans-unit.source: The check box is neither checked nor unchecked, and it is in the third or mixed state.
trans-unit.target: 复选框既不处于选中状态也不处于未选中状态，而是处于第三种状态或混合状态。

trans-unit.source: An object without a visible user interface.
trans-unit.target: 没有可视用户界面的对象。

trans-unit.source: A linked object that has not been previously selected.
trans-unit.target: 以前没有选择的链接对象。

trans-unit.source: An object with scrolling or moving text or graphics.
trans-unit.target: 具有滚动或移动文本或图形的对象。

trans-unit.source: A three-state check box or toolbar button whose state is indeterminate.
trans-unit.target: 状态不确定的三态复选框或工具栏按钮。

trans-unit.source: The check box is neither checked nor unchecked, and it is in the third or mixed state.
trans-unit.target: 复选框既不处于选中状态也不处于未选中状态，而是处于第三种状态或混合状态。

trans-unit.source: A movable object.
trans-unit.target: 可移动对象。

trans-unit.source: An object that accepts multiple selected items.
trans-unit.target: 接受多个选定项的对象。

trans-unit.source: No state.
trans-unit.target: 无状态。

trans-unit.source: No on-screen representation.
trans-unit.target: 无屏幕表示形式。

trans-unit.source: A sound or alert object would have this state, or a hidden window that is never made visible.
trans-unit.target: 声音或警报对象，或者从不呈现可视状态的隐藏窗口，都会具有此状态。

trans-unit.source: A pressed object.
trans-unit.target: 被按下的对象。

trans-unit.source: A password-protected edit control.
trans-unit.target: 有密码保护的编辑控件。

trans-unit.source: A read-only object.
trans-unit.target: 只读对象。

trans-unit.source: An object that can accept selection.
trans-unit.target: 可以接受所选内容的对象。

trans-unit.source: A selected object.
trans-unit.target: 选定的对象。

trans-unit.source: The object or child can use text-to-speech (TTS) to describe itself.
trans-unit.target: 对象或子级可以使用“文字到语音”（TTS）来描述自己。

trans-unit.source: A speech-based accessibility aid should not announce information when an object with this state has the focus, because the object automatically announces information about itself.
trans-unit.target: 当具有此状态的对象有焦点时，基于语音的辅助功能不会通告信息，因为对象会自动通告有关它自身的信息。

trans-unit.source: A sizable object.
trans-unit.target: 可调整大小的对象。

trans-unit.source: A linked object that has previously been selected.
trans-unit.target: 以前已选择的链接对象。

trans-unit.source: An unavailable object.
trans-unit.target: 不可用的对象。

trans-unit.source: A valid object.
trans-unit.target: 有效的对象。

trans-unit.source: This property is deprecated in [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 此属性在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)] 中已被否决。
